Hi all,

Just now updating the SharpNEAT screenshots page and I decided to
create a small animation of the visual discrimination task showing how
the output pixel activation level varies as the box activation areas
on the input pixels are moved. Thought some would be interested in
seeing this...

http://sharpneat.sourceforge.net/screenshots2/visual_discrimination_anim.gif
http://sharpneat.sourceforge.net/screenshots.htm

Colin.
